alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 8:31PM EDT until July 23 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Franklin County in central Ohio... Northeastern Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 830 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mechanicsburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hilliard, London, Jefferson, West Jefferson, Choctaw Lake, Lake Darby, Lafayette, Interstate 70 at US Route 42, Amity, Lilly Chapel, State Route 29 at State Route 38, Rosedale, Resaca, Madison Lake and Plumwood. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 73 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
